mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (item_id, cust_id, item_cnt, item_ck) VALUES (#{itemId}, #{custId}, #{itemCnt}, #{itemCk})
mapper.select:
SELECT a.cust_id, a.item_id, a.item_cnt, a.item_ck, b.name, b.price, b.ship_type, b.pkg_type, b.item_dc_amt, b.item_qty FROM cart a left outer join item b on a.item_id = b.item_id WHERE cust_id = #{custId}
AND item_ck = 'Y'
